Description_lang: Consume the serum heightening your senses to their limit for 3 sec, granting you 100% damage reduction up to a total of X damage. Reducing damage with his effect will cause you to repost with a Counter dealing Y Physical damage to your assailant.Performing a Counter during the first 1.5 sec of the effect will instead perform a Perfect Counter dealing 100% more damage.Only a single counter or Perfect Counter may occur per use.
